response.original_title: I KNOW LOVE IS REAL, BECAUSE I EXIST AND I'M SO FULL OF IT
response.overview: A hybrid documentary about love, Gabby Lauren expresses her trouble understanding the notion of love throughout life. She turns to friends and interviews them, and in return, receives a collection of nostalgic and intimate conversations on what love is to them. Following two sisters, a couple and a cat lady consider the subject of love and how it has impacted their relationships and lives. This short film puts love in the forefront, a nostalgic collection of love in different forms. Portraying the growth of the relationships on screen and stepping into the warmth of their memories.
response.title: I KNOW LOVE IS REAL, BECAUSE I EXIST AND I'M SO FULL OF IT
